title: RDS cluster storing credit card transaction data is not encrypted at rest
stealth_technique: Relying on AWS defaults without explicit encryption configuration - common in quick deployments

title: Security group allows unrestricted inbound access to Lambda function
stealth_technique: Appears as temporary testing configuration that was never removed

title: S3 bucket containing sensitive transaction logs has no audit logging enabled
stealth_technique: Logging often overlooked as non-functional requirement during initial deployment
